{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1121556,"totalDownVotes":119321,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":619849,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4221696,"totalDownVotes":771895,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":410715,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3766295,"totalDownVotes":310337,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":104695,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":387842,"totalDownVotes":38551,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[TORD] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":53452,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":610993,"totalDownVotes":46922,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":63992,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":900046,"totalDownVotes":57391,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":49490,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"New Bloodline + Big changes:

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3225878,"totalDownVotes":282365,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":76492,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2769917,"totalDownVotes":363012,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":45656,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":526353,"totalDownVotes":36943,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":43873,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":264497,"totalDownVotes":33607,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":27125,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2194026,"totalDownVotes":300320,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":87726,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙 Игра, которая бередит воображение! Беседуй, играй в игры, зарабатывай монеты и обустраивай собственный дом! 💙 

✨ Мы постоянно работаем над обновлениями! 

💙 Играй в «Мип-Сити» с миллионами других игроков!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2071650,"totalDownVotes":286748,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":49998,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2132409,"totalDownVotes":657179,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":80767,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4355441,"totalDownVotes":589218,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak 👀","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":36277,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Bienvenue dans Jailbreak (Évasion de prison)! Incarne un policier ou un criminel. Stoppe les crimes ou commets-les. Fais respecter la loi ou enfreins-la. Dans ce monde, le choix t'appartient. 

Notre dernière mise à jour... 
💰 4 possibilités de banque! Choisie au hasard à chaque vol! 
💎 NOUVELLE bijouterie! 
💎 6 niveaux de bijouterie possibles! 3 choisis au hasard à chaque vol! 
💰 Gagne 3 fois plus d'argent en dévalisant la station essence et la boutique de beignets! 
🎮 [Serveurs VIP] Le temps d'attente des vols est maintenant réduit quand il y a assez de joueurs à l'intérieur! 

Vignettes par @ID0ntHaveAUse et Roblox! 

Suis-nous sur les réseaux sociaux ci-dessous pour obtenir des mises à jour en avance!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1019277,"totalDownVotes":51248,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":31434,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":141232,"totalDownVotes":7809,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":19525,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1417663,"totalDownVotes":118872,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":37296,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Construye tu barco y zarpa hacia la aventura!

¡No olvides ver nuestro grupo! ttps://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840
Beneficios del grupo:
✨Miembro✨ --- ¡25% más Oro!
💫Mega Miembro💫 --- ¡300% más vida! --- ¡25% más Oro!
🌟Miembro Royal🌟 --- ¡+4 Barriles de TNT! --- ¡300% más vida! --- ¡25% más Oro!"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2322019,"totalDownVotes":243976,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":62016,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":695852,"totalDownVotes":94441,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":22354,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Bienvenidos a Islas!

 🌲 Construir su propia isla

🌵 Update Log (August 9):
- Potion Brewing

- Skorp Mob

- Vamp Bow

- Selected Item Title
- Added French Translations

🎵 Música por: https://twitter.com/LawnReality"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1188066,"totalDownVotes":67834,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":20948,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":661014,"totalDownVotes":128179,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":11232,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":268379,"totalDownVotes":141550,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":22999,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1794772,"totalDownVotes":140042,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":9832,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

Club Roblox","placeId":3457390032,"playerCount":36764,"imageToken":"T_3457390032_bedf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🍬 COTTON CANDY FLOSS STAND UPDATE!

"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":186425,"totalDownVotes":30623,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":8634,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":7371243,"creatorName":"Ready, set, more!","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":240211,"totalDownVotes":13103,"universeId":1934249057,"name":"Tropical Resort Tycoon 🌴","placeId":5534174456,"playerCount":19222,"imageToken":"T_5534174456_abb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"METAVERSE CHAMPIONS EVENT:

🌴 Enter the portal across the street from the Resort!
🌋 Build a secret Volcano Island (limited time event)
👧 Build the first lab to receive Fey's Week 3 badge!
🎁 Receive a permanent in-game prize for completing the island!

Event ends May 7th! 

Build your Tropical Resort and complete your island! Drive epic vehicles, roleplay with friends, explore, and so much more! 🌴🌊🚘

💾 Tycoons autosave 💾 

🔔 Hit the FOLLOW button to get notified about updates! 🔔

Brought to you by the team at Ready, set, play!

filiptibell - Scripting & UI
pollopollop - Game Design & Modeling
michaelvanderfin - World Design & Modeling

🎮 Join our group for 10,000 in-game currency! 🎮
https://www.roblox.com/groups/7371243"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":514220,"totalDownVotes":42282,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":11918,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! If you're feeling up for a challenge, try taking on harder bosses on harder difficulties!

👥💵 Join the group for +$100 starting cash! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Thumbs up and favorite for more quality updates!🌟

🔨UPDATES🔨
+ 🎃 HALLOWEEN PART 2

+ 📦 DEMON SKINS
+ 🍂 MORE SEASON RANKS
+ 🛠️ BUG FIXES + CHANGES
